segments.text: Well , what about it ? As it happens I've got two tickets for next thursday evening . I thought perhaps .

segments.text: Well , thanks all the same , Denise . But no I don't think.Sorry , I'm sure you would enjoy it . I'd like to Denise , but I'm busy on friday this week and next week too .

segments.text: But I said thursday.The tickets are for thursday evening .

segments.text: Thursday ? Oh , sorry . I meant thursday too . I mean I busy then too .

segments.text: I see.Oh , well some other time perhaps .
